name: Yangshuo Invasion
summary: Doom 1 episode replacement with familiar guns and demons modified for more lightweight, fast-paced gameplay, plus a bunch of unique additional features. Built around Bite-Sized Threats, a vanilla-compatible gameplay mod that speeds up the pace of Doom by drastically reducing both monster health and ammo available.
